PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07652019-06-09,  ,  ,  ,  PCH
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCanadian Broadcasting Corporation - Regina Consolidation Projet
PrecisOrder approving Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to (1) terminate its current head lease with the Province of Saskatchewan, for the property located at 2440 Broad Street, in Regina, Saskatchewan; (2) surrender ownership of the building it currently occupies on that property to the Province of Saskatchewan; and (3) enter into a new lease with the Province of Saskatchewan as tenant in the same building in a reduced right-sized area.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
